column1: #text=My daughters birthday is today and She wants a pineapple upside down cake .
#text=I have all the ingredients and I gather them according to the recipe and place them on the counter .
#text=I like having everything together before hand .

#text=The cake needs to bake at 350 degrees , so I turned the oven on to preheat so it is at the right temperature when I am done mixing the cake , The recipes say to put all the wet ingredient into the mixer first and mix well .
#text=Then all the dry ingredients go in and mix for 3 minutes .
#text=The mixture is now a thick batter that I can pour into cake pans that have been greased with shortening or butter and coated with a bit of flour so the cake does not stick .
#text=I place the brown sugar and pineapple in the bottom of the pan and split the batter equally between the two pans and put them into the oven .
#text=A short time late the cakes are done and I take them out to cool , when I turn the over I can see the pineapple is baked into the top of the cake .
